column9: validateForm: function () {         var formValid = true;         function validateOptions(elOptions) {             var optionsValid = false;             var i = 0;             while (!optionsValid && i < elOptions.length) {                 if (elOptions[i].checked) optionsValid = true;                 i++;             }             return optionsValid;         }         function validateEmail(email) {             var atpos = email.indexOf(\"@\");             var dotpos = email.lastIndexOf(\".\");             var valid = (atpos < 1 || dotpos < atpos + 2 || dotpos + 2 >= email.length) ? false : true;             return valid;         }         function markError(containerId
column10: valid) {             var elContainer = document.getElementById(containerId);             var elErrorSpan = elContainer.querySelector('.mauticform-errormsg');             elErrorSpan.style.display = (valid) ? 'none' : '';         }         var elForm = document.getElementById(this.formId);          var valid = (elForm.elements[\"mauticform[name]\"].value != '');                 markError('mauticform_name'
column11: valid);         if (!valid) formValid = false;          var valid = validateEmail(elForm.elements[\"mauticform[email]\"].value);                 markError('mauticform_email'

column13: valid);         if (!valid) formValid = false;          if (formValid) {             document.getElementById('mauticform_KaleidoscopeRegistration_return').value = document.URL;         }         return formValid;     }
column14: checkMessages: function() {         var query = {};         location.search.substr(1).split(\"&\").forEach(function(item) {query[item.split(\"=\")[0]] = item.split(\"=\")[1]});         if (typeof query.mauticError !== 'undefined') {             var errorContainer = document.getElementById('mauticform_KaleidoscopeRegistration_error');             errorContainer.innerHTML = decodeURIComponent(query.mauticError);         } else if (typeof query.mauticMessage !== 'undefined') {             var messageContainer = document.getElementById('mauticform_KaleidoscopeRegistration_message');             messageContainer.innerHTML = decodeURIComponent(query.mauticMessage);         }     } } MauticForm_KaleidoscopeRegistration.checkMessages(); </script>"
